          <title>
            <string language="en">A vacuum flask</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Vakuumflasche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un flacon de vide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um flask do vácuo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una boccetta di vuoto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια κενή φιάλη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un frasco del vacío</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows a vacuum flask.  The vacuum section on the wall is the key to the insulating property of this flask.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Energy</string>

          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt eine Vakuumflasche. 
Das Vakuumkapitel auf der Wand ist- die Taste zur isolierenden 
Eigenschaft dieser Flasche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre un flacon de vide. La 
section de vide sur le mur est la clé à la propriété isolante de 
ce flacon.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra um flask do vácuo. A 
seção do vácuo na parede é a chave à propriedade isolando deste 
flask.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra una boccetta di vuoto. 
La sezione di vuoto sulla parete è il tasto alla proprietà 
isolante di questa boccetta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει κενή φιάλη. Το 
κενό τμήμα τοίχου είναι το πλήκτρο στη μονώνοντας ιδιοκτησία 
αυτής της φιάλης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra un frasco del vacío. 
La sección del vacío en la pared es el clave a la 
característica aislador de este frasco.</string>
          </description>
